name: Glamping Hotel
description: {'Information': ["Glamping Hotel is a luxurious escape into nature, designed for guests who love the outdoors but want the comforts of a premium stay. Nestled in a serene natural setting, the hotel features eco-friendly tents, domes, and cabins equipped with plush bedding, private bathrooms, air conditioning, and stylish interiors. Whether you're a couple looking for a romantic getaway or a family seeking adventure, Glamping Hotel offers a peaceful retreat with exceptional service, privacy, and immersion in nature. Enjoy stargazing by the campfire, guided nature hikes, and wellness experiences all while being surrounded by breathtaking landscapes."], 'Rooms and Suites': ['Luxury Safari Tents: Spacious tents with queen-size beds, en-suite bathrooms, and private decks.', 'Geodesic Domes: Panoramic views, climate control, and chic interiors.', 'Wooden Cabins: Perfect for families, with multiple beds and kitchenette facilities.', 'Couples Retreat Pods: Romantic pods with outdoor jacuzzis and privacy.'], 'Location & Accessibility': ['Glamping Hotel is located in a peaceful natural area just outside the town of Përmet, Albania. It is easily reachable by car or shuttle from Tirana International Airport (TIA). The site is accessible via paved roads, and free parking is available onsite. Wheelchair-accessible units are also available upon request.'], 'Dining and Facilities': ['On-site Restaurant: Serves organic farm-to-table meals, local dishes, and vegan options.', 'Outdoor Lounge & Firepit: Ideal for evening gatherings or stargazing.', 'Wellness Center: Offers massages, yoga sessions, and nature therapy.', 'Adventure Activities: Kayaking, hiking trails, and guided eco-tours.', 'Wi-Fi Zones: Available in common areas.', '24/7 Concierge Service']}
short_description: A riverside glamping retreat along the wild Vjosa River, combining adventure sports, eco‑conscious luxury tents, and authentic Albanian hospitality.

name: Anija
description: {'About Anija': ['Restaurant Anija, locally known as “Te Anija” (“At The Boat”), is set on the shores of a scenic artificial lake in Janjevo, about 11\u202fkm southeast of Pristina. It features a distinctive boat-themed decor, even including a replica of the Eiffel Tower—built “as a consolation for people who cannot go to Paris”  wikimapia.org +11 reuters.com +11 tiktok.com +11 . The restaurant is praised for its warm hospitality, welcoming both families and groups in an open-air lakeside environment. Guests often enjoy Mediterranean-style grilled meats and fresh seafood, alongside a selection of coffee and beverages .'], 'Menu Highlights': ['Mediterranean Mixed Grill – A crowd-favorite, featuring perfectly cooked seafood and meat assortments .', 'Seafood & Meat Plates – Often described as expertly prepared in a casual, lakeside vibe', 'Coffee & Drinks – Popular spot for coffee and social beverages in an outdoor setting.'], 'Location & Accessibility': ['Address: Janjevo, Lipjan 14050, Kosovo (Approx. 11km from Pristina City Center)'], 'Opening Hours': ['Monday–Sunday: 07:00\u202fAM – 11:45\u202fPM (23:45) .']}
short_description: A charming lakeside grill restaurant and bar, Anija offers a relaxed, family-friendly setting with a focus on Mediterranean mixed‑grill dishes and casual drinks.

name: Joena Supermarket
description: {'information': ['Joena Supermarket, located on Frederik Shiroka Street in Tirana (postal code 1001), is praised for its low prices, broad selection—from fresh produce to cosmetics and household goods—and friendly service. It spans two floors, with kitchen and home items downstairs. The store has ample parking and caters both to locals and tourists'], 'Highlights': ['Most popular products: Groceries, cosmetics, household items, and cleaning supplies.', 'Friendly staff & fair prices: Staff are known for being welcoming, and the supermarket consistently offers some of the lowest prices in Tirana.', 'Two-floor layout: The store has two levels, with kitchenware and home goods located on the lower floor.', 'Support for local business: Shopping at Joena Supermarket supports a small, locally owned business and enhances the feeling of community connection.'], 'Tourist Experience': ['Suitable for tourists? Yes—wide product range, affordable, English spoken by staff.', 'Proximity to attractions: Near 21 Dhjetori intersection, Meridian Community Center, German Hospital, and Tirana Mosaic landmark', 'Parking & convenience: Offers parking, easy access, and caters to tourists and expats.'], 'Opening Hours': ['Monday–Sunday: 07:00\u202fAM – 10:30\u202fPM'], 'How to Get There': ['Landmarks: Near the German Hospital and Tirana Mosaic; easy to find on foot or by ride-hailing.']}

name: Al-Khalifa Heritage Museum
description: {'Site and history': ["Al-Khalifa Heritage Museum is situated in the town of Al-Hulailah Al-Ahsa Governorate It was founded by Mr Ibrahim bin Khalifa Al-Khalifa who spent decades collecting these artifacts from various parts of Al-Ahsa and the Kingdom The museum's history reflects the founder's passion for preserving the cultural legacy of the region and documenting aspects of ancient life for the people of Al-Ahsa"], 'Architecture and design': ['Al-Khalifa Heritage Museum is characterized by its design which considers the systematic and appropriate display of artifacts according to their nature The museum is typically divided into sections or rooms each showcasing a different aspect of ancient life such as agricultural tools cooking utensils pottery traditional clothing ancient manuscripts old coins and handicrafts The design may be simple and traditional to align with the nature of the exhibits'], 'Historical and cultural importance': ["Al-Khalifa Heritage Museum holds great historical and cultural significance It serves as a living archive documenting Al-Ahsa's ancient history and preserving the memory of its successive generations The museum contributes to safeguarding popular heritage from vanishing and introduces new generations and visitors to the lifestyle crafts and innovations of their ancestors It also reinforces a sense of national belonging to heritage"], 'Activities to be done': ["Visitors to Al-Khalifa Heritage Museum can enjoy a variety of activities including touring through the museum's various sections and exploring thousands of rare archaeological and heritage artifacts learning about the details of daily life for the people of ancient Al-Ahsa through the displayed tools and artifacts observing old handicrafts and their tools used by ancestors in their daily lives and taking souvenir photos with the heritage items that bear witness to past eras"]}
short_description: Al-Khalifa Heritage Museum is a national treasure in Al-Ahsa offering visitors a fascinating journey into the region's rich history It serves as an important educational and cultural platform contributing to solidifying heritage awareness and preserving it for future generations

name: Abdul Razzaq Al Arab Museum
description: {'The site and the date': ['Abdulrazzaq Al-Arab Museum is situated in the Al-Shahabiyah district of Hofuf It was established in 2017 as a personal project by Abdulrazzaq Abdulaziz Al-Arab who sought to collect and preserve the popular and historical heritage of the region The museum offers visitors a journey through time to explore various aspects of ancient life in Al-Ahsa and the Kingdom'], 'Architecture and design': ['The museum building consists of a modern building that includes several halls to display holdings, which includes a large hall and a long corridor that leads to four halls inside a villa systematically divided into the display of pieces. The holdings are displayed in a coordinated manner using shelves, glass periods, suspension and wooden charts, which makes it easier for visitors to roam and enjoy the contents'], 'Historical and cultural importance': ["Abdulrazzaq Al-Arab Museum holds great historical and cultural significance It embodies the ancient past of the region and contributes to preserving popular heritage from vanishing The museum showcases aspects of the country's culture and people's way of life since ancient times making it a source of knowledge for the current generation and researchers It also serves as a window transporting visitors to explore the history of Al-Ahsa and the country"], 'Activities to be done': ["Visitors to the Abdel -Razzaq Arab Museum can enjoy a variety of activities, including wandering, exploring the various parts of the museum and its various exhibits, spending time to see exhibits dating back to different time period On handicrafts and their tools such as pottery and visiting specialized sections such as the bride's room, ancient council and kitchen that includes old utensils"]}
short_description: The Abdul Razzaq Al Arab Museum is a cultural treasure in Al -Ahsa that provides an experience rich in information and heritage for visitors, as it gives them the opportunity to indulge in the history of the ancient region and get to know the life of the ancestors through a valuable group of heritage holdings

name: Zaki Abdul -Ghani Al -Salem farms
description: {'The site and the date': ["Zaki Abdulghani Al-Salem Farms are located in the fertile Al-Ahsa Oasis, the original home of Hasaoui Rice. The cultivation of Hasaoui Rice in Al-Ahsa dates back hundreds of years; it's a crop that adapts to hot climates and is grown in special soil. Zaki Abdulghani Al-Salem Farms embody the continuity of this ancient agricultural craft, where those in charge strive to preserve Hasaoui Rice from extinction and develop cultivation methods to increase production and enhance quality."], 'Architecture and design': ['The design of Hasaoui rice farms relies on the nature of cultivating this crop, which requires large areas of land to be submerged in water for extended periods. These farms feature level fields divided into small basins to ensure regular flooding. The farms utilize specialized cultivation methods that demand expertise and knowledge of the rice growth stages, and these may be combined with modern techniques to increase efficiency. These farms reflect the unique agricultural ecosystem required for rice cultivation.'], 'Historical and cultural importance': ['The Hassawi Cedar Farms, including Zaki Abdul -Ghani Al -Salem farms of historical, cultural and economic importance, are partly part of the agricultural heritage of Al -Ahsa, which dates back for centuries and cultural'], 'Activities to be done': ['Zaki Abdul -Ghani Al -Salem farms may allow visitors to visitors opportunities to learn about the unique Hassawi rice cultivation process, including stages of seedlings, irrigation and harvesting. Visitors can also see the wide green fields and learn about the efforts made to preserve this rare crop. An opportunity may have an opportunity to buy the Hassawi rice directly from the source and taste the local dishes that depend on it']}
short_description: Zaki Abdul -Ghani Al -Salem farms for Al -Hasawi rice is a beating heart that revives the ancient agricultural heritage and offers visitors a unique opportunity to see the scenes of cultivation of one of the most important crops of the region, which makes it an ideal destination for identifying the originality and efforts made to preserve the agricultural heritage

name: Al Hasawi lemon farm
description: {'The site and the date': ['Al -Hasawi lemon farms are spread throughout the Al -Ahsa Oasis in the eastern region of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The date of the cultivation of al -Hasawi lemon in Al -Ahsa dates back to hundreds of years, as generations inherited it as a father of a grandfather.'], 'Architecture and design': ['"Design" of Hassawi lemon farms is a traditional agricultural design that reflects the nature of the green oases in Al -Ahsa. The farms consist of regular rows of lemon trees that need spaced distances ranging from 6 to 7 meters to grow well and the tree receives special care throughout the year from pruning, fertilization and regular watering to maintain their productivity and high quality.'], 'Historical and cultural importance': ['Count the al -Hasawi lemon and its farms is an integral part of the cultural and economic heritage of Al -Ahsa historically.'], 'Activities to be done': ['Visitors to Al -Hasawi lemon farms in Al -Ahsa can enjoy many activities, including wandering between tall lemon trees and enjoying the fragrance of its distinctive smell to identify the methods of care for the lemon and pruning and fertilization processes and watch the process of harvesting fruits during the summer season. Fresh lemon can also be tasted and purchased by local products made of it.']}
short_description: Hasaoui Lemon Farms are an agricultural icon in Al-Ahsa, offering a unique experience that combines the beauty of nature with the essence of agricultural heritage. This makes them an ideal destination to discover an authentic part of Al-Ahsa's identity and enjoy its natural treasures.

name: Strawberry farm
description: {'The site and the date': ['The strawberry farm is located in Al -Ahsa, specifically near the Herfy Roundabout in Al -Aqir Road. It was mentioned in some sources. This project is a branch of a larger project that started with strawberry production and then expanded to include the production of seedlings using a patented cultivation system. The project was developed to become a tourist destination that receives visitors and provides them with many services to turn from just a farm to an integrated entertainment experience'], 'Architecture and design': ["The strawberry farm's design focuses on modern agriculture while providing a comfortable and attractive environment for visitors. The farm often uses advanced techniques like hydroponics and hydro-cooling cells to ensure year-round, high-volume strawberry production, reaching up to one hundred tons annually. The design allows visitors to stroll inside the protected areas and easily pick strawberries from vertical farming towers without needing to bend down. It may also feature waterfalls, bird-feeding areas, and seating areas, enhancing the overall recreational experience."], 'Historical and cultural importance': ['The strawberry farm in Al -Ahsa is of an economic and economic importance that contributes to supporting local agriculture, diversifying sources of income and providing a high -quality, tourist product that constitutes a distinctive addition to entertainment destinations in Al -Ahsa and the Al -Ahsa countryside interface specifically, which attracts visitors from inside and outside the region and enhances awareness of the importance of modern agriculture and sustainability'], 'Activities to be done': ['The strawberry farm visitors can enjoy a variety of activities, including fresh strawberry harvesting themselves directly from plants, providing a unique interactive experience, wandering inside the reserves, watching modern agricultural methods such as vertical and water agriculture, photography between strawberries, green landscapes, relaxation in areas designated for sitting, enjoying the calm atmosphere, buying fresh products from strawberry and other']}
short_description: Strawberry farm in Al -Ahsa offers an innovative agricultural tourist experience that combines the pleasure of harvesting fruits and enjoying an organized natural environment, which makes it an ideal destination for families and individuals looking for entertainment and learning in the heart of the green oasis

name: Al -Ahsa countryside interface park
description: {'The site and the date': ['The Al -Ahsa countryside front park is located in the rural area of \u200b\u200bAl -Ahsa Oasis, and it is a relatively modern project that aims to exploit the unique agricultural and natural ingredients of the oasis.'], 'Architecture and design': ["The design of Al-Ahsa Rural Waterfront Park focuses on its rural and agricultural character. The park will include vast green spaces of farms and orchards and the irrigation canals for which Al-Ahsa is famous. The park is expected to feature walking and cycling paths and designated picnic areas, in addition to service facilities such like restaurants and cafes offering local foods. The design aims to integrate visitors into the oasis's agricultural environment and provide an authentic and enjoyable experience."], 'Historical and cultural importance': ["Al-Ahsa Rural Waterfront Park holds significant cultural and economic importance. Culturally, it contributes to highlighting Al-Ahsa's rich agricultural heritage and educating visitors about the importance of agriculture and water in the region. Economically, it supports local tourism and creates new economic opportunities by attracting visitors and promoting local agricultural and handcrafted products. The park also serves as a lasting reminder of the vital role agriculture has played in shaping Al-Ahsa's identity throughout history."], 'Activities to be done': ['Wandering on farms and orchards: Explore the agricultural nature of the oasis and learn about the types of palm trees and other crops', 'Bicycle riding and walk', 'Learn about traditional irrigation methods: watching antique irrigation channels and the spailing system that distinguishes the oasis', 'Family Palmers: Eliminate enjoyable times in a quiet rural atmosphere']}
short_description: The Al -Ahsa countryside interface is an ambitious project that represents a qualitative addition to tourist destinations in Al -Ahsa provides visitors with a unique opportunity to indulge in the magic of rural life and get to know the agricultural and historical wealth of the oasis, which makes it an ideal destination for those looking for an authentic and different experience

name: Kut Park

name: King Abdullah Environmental Park

name: Al -Mashqar Park
description: {'The site and the date': ['Al -Mashqar Park is located in Al -Ahsa and was previously known as "Al -Shaibani" and it was renamed in relation to the historical "Al -Mashqar Fort", which is believed to be built 5,000 years ago.'], 'Architecture and design': ['Al -Mashqar Park is characterized by vast green spaces and wide gardens that provide a calm and comfortable atmosphere for relaxation and enjoying picturesque natural manifestations. name: Al -Ahsa National Park
description: {'The site and the date': ['The Al-Ahsa National Park is located in the northeastern part of Al-Hofuf city. Work on establishing the park began in 1960 CE (1380 AH) with the aim of stabilizing moving sand dunes and planting trees to combat desertification. Over time, the park evolved to become an integrated environmental and recreational landmark, bearing witness to the efforts made in transforming the desert into a green oasis.'], 'Architecture and design': ['"Design" of Al -Ahsa National Park is an environmental design and landscape engineering. The park is characterized by vast areas of green surfaces and dense and varied trees planted to fix the sand and provide a rich natural environment that includes the park industrial lakes and water channels that give it special beauty in addition to walking corridors and areas dedicated to picnics and barbecue. The design focuses on providing a comfortable and attractive natural environment for visitors.'], 'Historical and cultural importance': ['Al -Ahsa National Park carries great environmental importance, as it is a pioneering project in combating desertification and turning sand into cultural green forests. The park is part of the identity of Al -Ahsa, which is famous for the beauty of its nature and green oases, as it represents a place for the social gathering and entertainment of the residents of Al -Ahsa and its visitors, which enhances societal ties'], 'Activities to be done': ['Al -Ahsa National Park visitors can enjoy a variety of activities, including hiking, relaxing, enjoying wide green spaces and areas for sitting and family picnics. They can also use walking and running corridors, cycling and benefit from areas designated for barbecue and family picnics. They can also sit next to lakes and water channels to enjoy quiet landscapes']}
short_description: Al -Ahsa National Park is more than just a green space. It is an environmental success story and a major entertainment destination that combines the beauty of nature and the comfort of visitors, which makes it an ideal place to relax and enjoy the calm atmosphere away from the hustle and bustle of the city

name: Al-Taraf Zoo

name: Al -Ahsa Castle
description: {'The site and the date': ['The Castle of the Municipality of Al -Ahsa is located in the city of Al -Mubarraz, near the government districts area, dating back to the ninth or tenth centuries AH (the fifteenth or sixteenth century AD), and it was used as a defensive and administrative center for the region, which reflects its strategic importance in that period'], 'Architecture and design': ['Al -Ahsa Castle is characterized by its defensive architectural design that depends on thick walls, towers and narrow corridors. The castle was built from local materials available in Al -Ahsa, such as clay and stones, and its design reflects the architectural style that was dominant in building fortifications and castles in the area'], 'Historical and cultural importance': ['The importance of the historic Al -Ahsa Castle lies in being a witness to the various periods of government and its role in protecting Al -Ahsa throughout the ages.'], 'Activities to be done': ['Learn about the history of the castle and its defensive and administrative role', 'Visit the shops inside the castle', 'Enjoy the living offers in which it is held', 'Take photographs of the archaeological teacher']}
short_description: Al -Ahsa Castle is an important historical landmark that embodies part of Al -Ahsa military and administrative history and offers visitors an opportunity to get to know the old fortifications and its role in protecting the region. It also provides a unique experience thanks to the presence of shops and live shows within it

name: The craftsmen market
description: {'The site and the date': ['The craftsmen market is located in the center of the city of Hofuf and is considered an extension of the historic Caesarean market and has been created with the aim of preserving traditional handicrafts in Al -Ahsa and presenting them to visitors and tourists'], 'Architecture and design': ['The craftsmen market is characterized by its design that combines originality and contemporary and consists of a group of stroke stores that display various types of handicrafts. name: Emiri School
description: {'The site and the date': ["The Al-Amiriya School is located in the center of Al-Hofuf city, near Ibrahim Palace and Al-Bay'ah House. Its construction began in 1335 AH (1916 CE), and it was inaugurated in 1340 AH (1921 CE) by King Abdulaziz Al Saud—may he rest in peace. It became the first public, formal school in Al-Ahsa and the Kingdom as a whole. The school witnessed the graduation of many generations of pioneers in science and knowledge who contributed to building the nation."], 'Architecture and design': ["Al-Amiriya School is located in the center of Al-Hofuf city, close to Ibrahim Palace and Al-Bay'ah House. Construction began in 1335 AH (1916 CE), and it was inaugurated in 1340 AH (1921 CE) by King Abdulaziz Al Saud. It holds the distinction of being the first public, formal school in Al-Ahsa and the Kingdom as a whole. The school has seen the graduation of numerous generations of pioneers in science and knowledge who played a vital role in building the nation"], 'Historical and cultural importance': ["The importance of the Emiri School lies in being the first regular government school in the Kingdom, which makes it a symbol of the beginning of modern education in the country. It is also part of the architectural and cultural heritage of Al -Ahsa and a witness to the state's interest in education since the early days of its foundation. The school has become a museum and an exhibition of ancient images"], 'Activities to be done': ['Explore old classrooms and learn about the education method in the past', 'See historical and exhibits documenting the education process in the Kingdom.', 'Meditation on the original architectural design of the building']}
short_description: The Emiri School is an educational and historical icon in Al -Ahsa. It embodies the march of education in the Kingdom and provides visitors with an opportunity to learn about an ancient history linking the past to the present.

name: Khuzam Palace
description: {'The site and the date': ['Khozam Palace is located at the edge of the Al-Mazrou’iyah neighborhood, west of Al-Hofuf city. It was built in the early years of the reign of Imam Saud bin Abdulaziz Al Saud in 1220 AH/1805 CE. Its purpose was to protect the city and regulate relations with the Bedouins who came to Al-Ahsa for trade.']}
short_description: Khuzam Palace is an important historical landmark in Al -Ahsa that represents part of the history of the region and deserves a visit to explore its history and its unique architectural design

name: Mahirus Palace
